creation_history: Created by Agni on December 13th 2021. Reason: After a lengthy unrelated discussion, Andreas pointed out that ["that sounds like the building blocks of blackmail"](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830522505605283866/919916646326476861), to which GMTA responded ":yakmail:" and Agni created the emoji.
description: Since Serenity has an e-mail client, it's only logical that there's a mail-themed yak.
name: Yakmail
